apk update
apk add --no-cache git make gcc g++ python

## add user
echo -e "adding container user"
useradd -d /home/container -m container -s /bin/bash

## make folders
file1="/mnt/server/.container-config/nginx/logs/error.log"
file2="/mnt/server/.container-config/php/logs/error.log"
file3="/mnt/server/.container-config/php/donttouch/php-fpm.sock"

mkdir -p "${file1%/*}" && touch "$file1"
mkdir -p "${file2%/*}" && touch "$file2"
mkdir -p "${file3%/*}" && touch "$file3"

## own server to container user
chown container: /mnt/server/

cd /mnt/server

# download branch
git clone --single-branch --branch ${INSTALL_BRANCH} ${INSTALL_REPO} project

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0
